prompt: Cartoon style, 3D animation. A cheerful 8-year-old Indian boy named Golu with a round face, big brown eyes, messy short black hair, wearing a simple orange cotton tunic and light brown shorts. He is happily kneeling in a sunlit, vibrant green village, gently planting a small green sapling into the rich soil. Soft morning sunlight, warm color palette, expressive facial features.
